org.seedstack.seed.web.spi

Class ServletDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.seed.web.spi.AbstractDefinition
      • org.seedstack.seed.web.spi.ServletDefinition

  • public class ServletDefinition
extends AbstractDefinition
    This class holds the full definition of a Servlet servlet. It can be returned as a collection element from WebProvider.servlets() to define the servlets that must be registered by Seed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServletDefinition(String name, Class<? extends javax.servlet.Servlet> servletClass)
      Creates a servlet definition with the specified name and class.

        public int getLoadOnStartup()
